pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sensitivity Analyses for Unmeasured Confounding and Other Biases in Observational Studies and Meta-Analyses // Conducts sensitivity analyses for unmeasured confounding, selection bias, and measurement error (individually or in combination; VanderWeele Ding (2017) doi:10.7326/M16-2607; Smith VanderWeele (2019) doi:10.1097/EDE.0000000000001032; VanderWeele Li (2019) doi:10.1093/aje/kwz133; Smith VanderWeele (2021) arXiv:2005.02908). Also conducts sensitivity analyses for unmeasured confounding in meta-analyses (Mathur VanderWeele (2020a) doi:10.1080/01621459.2018.1529598; Mathur VanderWeele (2020b) doi:10.1097/EDE.0000000000001180) and for additive measures of effect modification (Mathur et al., under review).
